org.vadere.util.voronoi

Class HalfEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vadere.util.voronoi.HalfEdge

  • public class HalfEdge
extends java.lang.Object
    Double-Connected Edge List according to the data structure described in the book Computational Geometry by Mark de Berg et al. (2008) pages 29ff.
